## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b3c2c55f506b91d470e684df10ad1966c1e9b280cfd26d344678c36158cf001f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vue-analytics-plugin' @ 9.9.21 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
